text: ^ will be a long week. will require bathing in rivers of caffeine hahah...

Is there a way to change the color of the LeadFlows Text? While changing the background is awesome, some colors wont pass WebAIM Contrast Checking and the font color seems to be set using the !important style so it might be harder to overwrite
Also where the `<style>` is loaded for the leadflows is right before the closing header so it makes it even worse when overriding the font colors.
Even at the point where the text flips from dark to light text, it still fails the webaim checker
<@U2H3TT8F2|ajlaporte> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/ajlaporte/F5QS77YBV/pasted_image_at_2017_06_08_02_06_pm.png|Pasted image at 2017-06-08, 2:06 PM>
it looks like only way to do so would be via JS to apply inline styling on the elements.
